verses.verse: So these <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H7673>ceased<s%> to <S%H6030>answer<s%> <S%H347>Job<s%>, because he was <S%H6662>righteous<s%> in his own <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.

Then was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> the <S%H639>wrath<s%> of <S%H453>Elihu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1292>Barachel<s%> the <S%H940>Buzite<s%>, of the <S%H4940>family<s%> of <S%H7410>Ram<s%>: against <S%H347>Job<s%> was his <S%H639>wrath<s%> <S%H2734>kindled<s%>, because he <S%H6663>justified<s%> <S%H5315>himself<s%> rather than <S%H430>God<s%>.

Also against his <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7453>friends<s%> was his <S%H639>wrath<s%> <S%H2734>kindled<s%>, because they had <S%H4672>found<s%> no <S%H4617>answer<s%>, and yet had <S%H7561>condemned<s%> <S%H347>Job<s%>.
Now <S%H453>Elihu<s%> had <S%H2442>waited<s%> to <S%H1697>speak<s%> unto <S%H347>Job<s%>, because they were elder than <S%H2205>he<s%>.

And when <S%H453>Elihu<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that there was no <S%H4617>answer<s%> in the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of these <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H582>men<s%>, his <S%H639>wrath<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%>.

And <S%H453>Elihu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1292>Barachel<s%> the <S%H940>Buzite<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>, I am <S%H6810>young<s%>, and ye are very <S%H3453>old<s%>; Wherefore I held <S%H2119>back<s%>, and <S%H3372>durst<s%> not <S%H2331>show<s%> you mine <S%H1843>opinion<s%>.
I <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3117>Days<s%> should <S%H1696>speak<s%>, And <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H8141>years<s%> should <S%H3045>teach<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>.
But <S%H403><s%> there is a <S%H7307>spirit<s%> in <S%H582>man<s%>, And the <S%H5397>breath<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> giveth them <S%H995>understanding<s%>.
It is not the <S%H7227>great<s%> that are <S%H2449>wise<s%>, Nor the <S%H2205>aged<s%> that <S%H995>understand<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%>.
Therefore I <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H8085>Hearken<s%> to <S%H2331>me<s%>; I also will show mine <S%H1843>opinion<s%>.
Behold <S%H3176><s%>, I waited for your <S%H1697>words<s%>, I <S%H238>listened<s%> for your <S%H8394>reasonings<s%>, Whilst ye searched <S%H2713>out<s%> what to <S%H4405>say<s%>.
Yea <S%H995><s%>, I attended unto <S%H3198>you<s%>, And, behold, there was none that convinced <S%H347>Job<s%>, Or that <S%H6030>answered<s%> his <S%H561>words<s%>, among you.
Beware lest ye <S%H559>say<s%>, We have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>; <S%H410>God<s%> may <S%H5086>vanquish<s%> <S%H376>him<s%>, not man:
For he hath not <S%H6186>directed<s%> his <S%H4405>words<s%> against <S%H7725>me<s%>; Neither will I answer him with your <S%H561>speeches<s%>.
They are <S%H2865>amazed<s%>, they <S%H6030>answer<s%> no <S%H6275>more<s%>: They have not a word to <S%H4405>say<s%>.
And shall I <S%H3176>wait<s%>, because they <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H5975>not<s%>, Because they stand still, and answer no <S%H6030>more<s%>?
I also will <S%H6030>answer<s%> my <S%H2506>part<s%>, I also will <S%H2331>show<s%> mine <S%H1843>opinion<s%>.
For I am <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H4405>words<s%>; The <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H990>within<s%> me constraineth <S%H6693>me<s%>.
Behold <S%H990><s%>, my breast is as <S%H3196>wine<s%> which hath no <S%H6605>vent<s%>; Like <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H178>wine-skins<s%> it is ready to <S%H1234>burst<s%>.
I will <S%H1696>speak<s%>, that I may be <S%H7304>refreshed<s%>; I will <S%H6605>open<s%> my <S%H8193>lips<s%> and <S%H6030>answer<s%>.
Let me <S%H5375>not<s%>, I pray you, respect any <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H6440>person<s%>; Neither will I give flattering <S%H3655>titles<s%> unto any <S%H120>man<s%>.
For I <S%H3045>know<s%> not to give flattering <S%H3655>titles<s%>; Else would my <S%H6213>Maker<s%> <S%H4592>soon<s%> take me <S%H5375>away<s%>.
